evidence.text: On February 7, 2025, at 7:22 PM, Special Counsel Dellinger received an email from Sergio Gor... 'On behalf of President Donald J. Trump, I am writing to inform you that your position as Special Counsel of the US Office of Special Counsel is terminated, effective immediately.'

extracted.value: President Trump terminated Special Counsel Hampton Dellinger via email on February 7, 2025, without cause, violating 5 U.S.C. § 1211(b), and the OSC's role in protecting civil service employees from unlawful terminations.

evidence.text: On February 10, plaintiff filed this action to assert his entitlement to the position of Special Counsel and prevent the defendants from interfering with or removing him from that role. See Compl. [Dkt. # 1]. He sued... At the same time, plaintiff moved for a temporary restraining order to enjoin the effort to terminate him. Pl.’s Mot. for a TRO [Dkt. # 2]. On February 21, defendants moved for summary judgment in their favor. Defs.’ Mot. for Summ. J. [Dkt. # 22]. On February 24, plaintiff filed a combined opposition to defendants’ motion, cross-motion for summary judgment on Count 1, and motion for permanent injunction.

extracted.value: Plaintiff filed Complaint and Motion for TRO on February 10, 2025; Defendants filed Motion for Summary Judgment on February 21, 2025; Plaintiff filed Cross-Motion for Summary Judgment and Permanent Injunction on February 24, 2025
